basisSet.dc:title: SVP (Dunning-Hay)
basisSet.dct:abstract: VDZP Valence Double Zeta + Polarization on All Atoms
basisSet.dc:description: Dunning-Hay Split Valence + Polarization Basis ---------------------------------------------- Elements Contraction References H: (4s,1p) -> [2s,1p] T. H. Dunning and P. J. Hay, in Methods of Li - Ne: (9s,5p,1d) -> [3s,2p,1d] Electronic Structure Theory, Vol. 3, H.F. Schaefer III, Ed. Plenum Press (1977).
